mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fdcs_info_ggdic ( dicName, dicPath, state, orderIndex, createTime) VALUES ( #{dicName}, #{dicPath}, #{state}, #{orderIndex}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(dicPath) FROM fdcs_info_ggdic WHERE LENGTH(dicPath)=#{orderIndex} AND dicPath like CONCAT('%',#{dicPath},'%')
